income_messages:
From: t************a@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-14 04:12:45
SUBJECT: From Mrs, Melissa Terry
From Mrs, Melissa Terry
my name is Melissa Terry  i am a  widow without no child i have $7.5 million dollars to donate to someone who can use it for humanitarian purposes in all sincerity, my doctor told me that i can not last for the next 3 months due to the illness of cancer i will want you to write me back so that i can explain better to you. Reply me with this Email address....(
terry33melissa@gmail.com
)
From: t************a@gmail.com
To: hl99675@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-14 22:01:50
SUBJECT: Fwd: From Mrs, Melissa Terry
Dearest in Lord,
I greet you in the name of God and I thank you for the time you have taken
to read my mail. I want you to know that my contact to you is God's divine
direction as i have taken my decision to donate this fund through you no
matter how relief or critical my health situation may be. I am a citizen of
Kuwait, but i presently live at Avenue Jacques Aka, Mgr René Kouassi
Street, Cocody, Abidjan Ivory Coast.
My present condition has obliged me to donate this fund for the building of
the temple of God and to support charity and humanitarian foundations that
will be a benefit to the orphans and less privileged children. I really
want you to carry out this project on my behalf, because i have vow to the
almighty God that my inheritance must be used in this way, because I do not
have a child to inherit this fund. To this effect, i must make the
necessary arrangements now that I am still alive, because if I die in
future the fund will be benefited by the bank, since i'm presently on
constant chemotherapy treatment.
I will want you to send me your full name and residence address, so that i
can use them for the official affidavit declaration that will legally prove
you the new beneficiary to this fund. I will send you the copy of the court
declaration and the fund certificate of deposit immediately after the
completion of the affidavit. I want you to urgently attend to this issue
because i want every necessary aspect of this project to be completed
before i will start the next chemotherapy treatment.
I have attached my picture here and i will like to have yours too..
Mrs Melissa Terry
